Question: Fog Hashing Pte.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Fog Hashing Pte., Ltd

BC Series Immersion Cooling Mining Container

- Ultimate cooling capacity
- Extreme stable & reliable
- Longer lifespan
- Supports 384 Antminers (S19/XP) or 480 Whatsminers (M50/M30) up to 2.02MW

B Series Warehouse-based Immersion Solutions

- Flexible & scalable
- Stable & reliable
- Customized from 100kW to 100MW
- 120kW, 240kW, 480kW, 1.2MW options available

C Series Home Mining

- Low noise
- Overclocking
- Easy installation
- Best for individual & SMB

M Series Designed for Whatsminer M56 Native Immersion Miner

- Compact & efficient
- Near-zero downtime
- Official overclocking with warranty
- Various models available: M1, M6, M20, MC40

FHC01 Coolant

- Special for liquid-cooling mining
- Safe and environment-friendly
- Strong thermal conductivity
- Available in 20L, 200L, 1000L

Global Distributors

- BITMARS
- Orient PDU
- Apextomining
- SICMINER s.r.l.
- HASHX Mining group
- Crypto Miners
- Safety Miner
- Goodkeeps Co., Ltd.

Fog Hashing's CES 2024 product lineup includes immersion cooling mining containers, warehouse-based solutions, home mining systems, immersion miner series, and specialized coolant.
